description:
Hoji is often seen riding his Hariyama but he is often too far off the ground to interact with people or things around him and falls off when trying to do things.
Hariyama battled in the final round of the Battle Frontier Glass Noisemaker Cup where it faced Ash`s Mr Mime (Mimey). It was very over matched despite its strength and multiple attacks and it lost the battle.
name: Hariteyama (Houji)
